channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Scooter's, 22nd April
item.description:
David Jaynes 07704755981 I would like to report the number scooters that are used in Cheltenham and basically left anywhere , these are becoming a nuisance and major obstructions on pathway and believe this will cause an accident especially for the elderly. Where we live in UpHatherley this morning 22/04/2025 there are 18 on Justicia Way and another 10+ on the pavement o by Glebe Farm so at least 28 within 200yards of each other . I donâ€™t know where the company are supposedly allowed to leave but these areas are good for them perhaps a space in Morrisons car park would be better . David Jaynes
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Justicia Way, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface
